items.issue: Missing core incorporation info (share capital, registered office, directors)
items.suggestion: Include details of registered office address, the names and addresses of the directors, and a complete breakdown of share capital including class, nominal value, number of shares, and total value.
Specify the exact obligations and powers granted to the appointed signatory.  Avoid vague terms like "as said person shall deem necessary or advisable".  Clearly define the scope of their authority.
Add a section for the signatures of the incorporating shareholders, including the date of signing.  Ensure that the signatures are witnessed and attested as per ADGM requirements.
